paper_abstract: An improved Genetic Algorithms (GA) for parameters estimation of multi-sine signals (PEMS) is proposed. The strategies of self-adaptive elite criterion, two-points crossover and cataclysmic mutation are employed in this algorithm to improve the performance of GA. For simplifying the computation, a complicated operating process is converted into several simple processes. A model of PEMS is also built which is conveniently applied to GA. Simulation results show that the proposed method is effective and superior to the least -mean squares (LMS) method.
paper_title: Parameters estimation of multi-sine signals based on genetic algorithms
